attributes.review: I was trying to support this app and the president Cheeto 🧡but it’s unacceptable that it had to take 3 week to install and once I opened it my phone started glitching over all I do NOT recommend this app it will make your phone glitch ! 😒
This app was horrible it took 3 hours just to download I have never had an issue like that with any other app before on top of that as soon as I would open the app it kept crashing
After reading the comments I found it hard to believe that it was really taking that long to download... I was wrong. 8,760 hours later and it’s only 1/4 of the way through. What a disgrace.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is absolutely trash, when I want to see how Trump can make a America great again I don’t see ANYTHING about equality, as a black man I’m offended and will not take chances voting for him because enough has happened already 😤
attributes.title: Seems very one sided

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever downloaded it took 3 weeks to download and when it did it hacked my phone and gave me a huge virus and now I can’t even watch Netflix because it blocked it 0/10 do not recommend 😡

Trump is a rapist and a racist I don’t know why people support him do you all know what trump has done.I was surprised that any would vote for him and the reason has anyone seen what this man has done.I really hope someone doesn’t in the upcoming election.
attributes.title: Trump the rapist and racist

attributes.review:

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it I got a notification saying that an old orange man wants to take me on a vacation to an island. But once he realized I’m of legal age he said never mind. This app makes me uncomfortable and is clearly stealing our data to give to other countries.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
